mapper.select: SELECT metaseq, file_scp_id, file_regdate, file_title, file_singer, file_scp, cate_code, file_xring1, file_xring2, file_xring3, ktf_lid, file_lring1, file_lring2, file_lring3, file_sort FROM TB_FILE_SERVICE_MAP2 WHERE cate_code = #{cate_code} AND file_sort = #{file_sort}
select KTF_LID from tb_file_info where file_xring = #{file_xring}
